General.Name: Rectron Ltd
General.Description: Rectron Limited manufactures and sells discrete semiconductors in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include bridge rectifiers, ESD diodes, high voltage products, recovery rectifiers, schottky diodes, signal-switching diodes, silicon carbide schottky, standard rectifiers, transistors, TVS and zener diodes, MOSFET, and other products. The company also offers various rectifiers and other semiconductor components; and medical equipment. In addition, it engages in real estate rental; and liquor trading businesses. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: 71, Zhongshan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23680
